scripts.seed: npx prisma db push --force-reset && npm run seed --workspace=api
scripts.dr:api: sudo docker container stop es-api-dev ; sudo docker container rm es-api-dev ; sudo docker container rm es-api-dev ; sudo docker image rm jpmadrigal/es-api-dev:latest ; sudo docker pull jpmadrigal/es-api-dev:latest && sudo docker compose -f ./docker/api/compose.yml up -d
scripts.dr:web: sudo docker container stop es-web-dev ; sudo docker container rm es-web-dev ; sudo docker container rm es-web-dev ; sudo docker image rm jpmadrigal/es-web-dev:latest ; sudo docker pull jpmadrigal/es-web-dev:latest && sudo docker compose -f ./docker/web/compose.yml up -d
scripts.dbp:web: docker image rm jpmadrigal/es-web-dev:latest ; docker compose -f ./docker/web/compose-build.yml --env-file .env.development build && docker push jpmadrigal/es-web-dev:latest
scripts.db:web-arm: docker image rm jpmadrigal/es-web-dev-arm:latest ; docker compose -f ./docker/web/compose-build-arm.yml --env-file .env build
scripts.dbp:api: docker image rm jpmadrigal/es-api-dev:latest ; docker build -f ./docker/api/Dockerfile -t jpmadrigal/es-api-dev . && docker push jpmadrigal/es-api-dev:latest
scripts.db:api-arm: docker image rm jpmadrigal/es-api-dev-arm:latest ; docker build -f ./docker/api/Dockerfile.arm -t jpmadrigal/es-api-dev-arm .
